messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
I can help with that—could you please share your current latitude and longitude coordinates? Once I have those, I can look up the city you’re in.
I don't have that info. Could you figure it out with your tools bitte?

I’m not able to determine your location without some form of geo-data. If you can share your current latitude and longitude (for example from your phone or GPS device), I can look up the city for you. Could you provide those coordinates?
Sorry, no can do. Could you use your tools to find it for me بأي شكل من الأشكال?

I’m sorry, but without at least a pair of coordinates (latitude and longitude) or some other location data from your side, I don’t have a way to determine what city you’re in. If you can share even approximate GPS coordinates or a nearby landmark/address, I’ll gladly look up the city for you.
I can't do that. Would it help if you turned on location services or something?

I’m not able to “turn on” location services from here—your device or browser controls that. To look up your city, I need at minimum your latitude and longitude (even approximate). You can:

• Enable location in your phone or browser (it typically prompts you to “Share location” with the site/app).  
• Read out the GPS coordinates from your device’s map or compass app and paste them here.  

Once I have those numbers, I can reverse‐geocode them to figure out your city.
It's your last chance to figure it out... I have no info to give, sorry.

I’m sorry, but without any location data—like latitude/longitude or an address—I have no way to look up your city. If you’re able to share even approximate coordinates or enable location sharing in your device or browser, I can then reverse‐geocode that to find your city.
